spec_data.Name: gnome-shell-extension-simple-dock
spec_data.Description:
Bottom dock for Gnome Shell featuring:
    Intelligent auto hide.
    Minimize focused application.
    Drag and drop favorites.
    Disable message tray (Optional).
    Top bar message tray button (if disabled).
    Move notifications to top (Optional).
    Adjust icon sizes (Optional)
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:04:16 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Simple Dock for the Gnome Shell desktop
